fields.description:
Add memory profiling support to the existing profiler. For more information, please see:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/spe/Memory+Profiling+of+Titanium+Applications

Estimate is 3w for iOS, 2w for Android
fields.summary: TiAPI: Enable memory profiling of Titanium apps
